name: Together Against
description:
Controls:

Together Against is a 2D competitive Co-op platformer where teamwork and betrayal collide! In this game, you and your partner must work together to reach a common goal, but be warned - points are also awarded for sabotaging your partner's progress! Will you choose to cooperate or compete?

Player 1:

  • A and D for Movement
  • W for Jump
  • E for Pickup
  • F Throw away

Player 2:

  • Arrow  Left and Right for Movement
  • Arrow Up for Jump
  • Period / "." for Pickup
  • Comma / "," Throw away
Team:

Stephanie Kühnl: Art (Kyunru)

Martin Jank: Programming, Level Design (mireyu)

Natascha Rauscher: Animation (KriSsS GonKo)

Martin Proprentner: Programming, Level Design (Prepe)

Sebastian Theuermann: Programming (20GOTO10)

Bernhard Nitsch: Programming, Level Design (Zom0)

Stefan Hohnwald: Programming (StefanHohnwald)

Stefan Putzinger: Music
